name: @xenova/transformers
description: Run ðŸ¤— Transformers in your browser! We currently support BERT, ALBERT, DistilBERT, T5, T5v1.1, FLAN-T5, GPT2, GPT Neo, BART, CodeGen, Whisper, CLIP, Vision Transformer, VisionEncoderDecoder, and DETR models, for a variety of tasks including: masked language modelling, text classification, text-to-text generation, translation, summarization, question answering, text generation, automatic speech recognition, image classification, zero-shot image classification, image-to-text, and object detection.
author: Xenova
